title: Attention and Focus
question: You're on a first date at a cozy caf√©. How likely are you to get distracted?
options: I'm all ears, barely notice anything else
I often find my attention wandering
What was the question again? That dog is adorable!

title: Organization and Time Management
question: You've planned a romantic surprise for your partner. How often do you find yourself scrambling at the last minute, realizing you forgot a crucial detail?
options: I'm always prepared, with time to spare
I often have to make last-minute adjustments

title: Impulsivity
question: Your crush suggests a spontaneous weekend getaway. How likely are you to say yes and figure out the details later?
options: I'd need to carefully consider it first
I might say yes if I can quickly check my schedule
I'd probably say yes and worry about details later

title: Restlessness or Hyperactivity
question: You're watching a romantic movie at home with your date. How challenging is it for you to sit through the entire film without fidgeting or wanting to do something else?
options: I can easily relax and enjoy the whole movie
I might shift positions or check my phone once or twice
I often need to take breaks or multitask
Sitting still for a whole movie?
